title: Ticket #399: condor_q -run and -format interact strangely.
description:
condor_q -run -format produces odd output.

condor_q -run works as expected: 

% condor_q -run | head

-- Submitter: ribera.cs.wisc.edu : <128.105.166.16:34160> : ribera.cs.wisc.edu
 ID      OWNER            SUBMITTED     RUN_TIME HOST(S)
1507.2   pdudnik         4/10 09:31   9+00:22:36 slot1@s1-23.cs.wisc.edu
1507.6   pdudnik         4/10 09:31   9+00:22:57 slot2@s1-23.cs.wisc.edu
1508.2   pdudnik         4/10 09:31   9+00:22:52 slot2@s1-28.cs.wisc.edu
1510.2   pdudnik         4/10 09:32   6+11:58:41 slot1@s1-27.cs.wisc.edu
1510.5   pdudnik         4/10 09:32   8+18:52:57 slot3@clover-17.cs.wisc.edu
1510.6   pdudnik         4/10 09:32   6+12:18:38 slot2@s1-29.cs.wisc.edu

condor_q -format works as expected: 

% condor_q -format '%s ' RemoteHost -format '%s\n' ImageSize -const 'JobStatus==2' | head
slot2@s0-06.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
slot2@s0-11.cs.wisc.edu 1000000
slot1@clover-29.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
slot3@clover-29.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
slot2@s1-14.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
slot1@s0-26.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
slot1@clover-22.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
slot3@clover-18.cs.wisc.edu 1200000
slot2@clover-22.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
slot1@clover-12.cs.wisc.edu 1200000

Both together partially works, but adds lines of [????]: 

% condor_q -run -format '%s ' RemoteHost -format '%s\n' ImageSize | head
slot2@s0-06.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
[????????????]  [????????????] [??????????] [????????????????]
slot3@clover-29.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
[????????????]  [????????????] [??????????] [????????????????]
slot2@s1-14.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
[????????????]  [????????????] [??????????] [????????????????]
slot3@clover-18.cs.wisc.edu 1200000
[????????????]  [????????????] [??????????] [????????????????]
slot2@clover-22.cs.wisc.edu 1100000
[????????????]  [????????????] [??????????] [????????????????]

Expected behavior: No lines full of brackets and question marks; essentially the same output if I replace "-run" with "-const JobStatus==2".
